alert.note: Alert for Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 6:02PM EDT until July 29 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN NEW CASTLE...KENT...NORTHEASTERN CAROLINE AND SOUTHWESTERN SALEM COUNTIES... At 602 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shiloh to near Dover to near Sandtown, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Dover, Smyrna, Camden, Clayton, Cheswold, Bowers, Goldsboro, Woodside, Viola, Hartly, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Woodland Beach, Hazlettville, Port Penn, Delaney Corner, Dover Base Housing, Dover Speedway, Sandtown, Green Spring and Rising Sun. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
